mapper.insert: insert into `contact` (userId, name, phone, category, gender, company, companyPhone, address, email, qq, website, birthday, comment, addTime) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{website,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.select: select id, userId, name, phone, category, gender, company, companyPhone, address, email, qq, website, birthday, comment, addTime from `contact` where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
